div.h1: Privacy Policy | Mary Immaculate English School

div.style: max-width: 1000px; margin: 40px auto; padding: 24px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.8; color: #333; background-color: #f9f9f9; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
div.p: Mary Immaculate English School ("we", "our", or "us") operates the Android mobile application and the website https://misbasirhat.com (the "Services").
This page is used to inform visitors and app users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information.
We do not collect personal data from users of the mobile app or website unless explicitly provided by the user for educational purposes (e.g., login information for student portals).
Any information shared is only used to facilitate school services such as viewing assignments, attendance, notices, or receiving push notifications.
Our website may use cookies to improve functionality. Log data (such as IP address, browser version) may be collected automatically to ensure the website works properly and securely.

We may use trusted third-party services like Firebase Cloud Messaging for push notifications. These services may collect limited data necessary for functionality but do not share it with unauthorized parties.
We value your trust in providing us your personal information, and we strive to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it.
Our services are intended for school students. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children without the involvement of their parents or guardians.
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date.
If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
